main event: A series of UFO sightings were reported in St. Louis, Missouri, with witnesses describing a large, silent disc hovering in the sky.
interesting points: The sightings occurred over several days, with multiple witnesses including a professional engineer and a registered nurse., The object was described as brilliantly lit and hovering about 100 feet above the ground., Witnesses observed the object for about 15 minutes before it disappeared without sound., No conventional explanations were deemed satisfactory by the witnesses., NORAD recorded the sightings but took no further action.
witness description: a professional engineer and his wife, along with nearby neighbors
